price: (15) Did We fail in the first creation? But they are in confusion over a new creation.
arabic: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلۡخَلۡقِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي لَبۡسٖ مِّنۡ خَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: afaʿayīnā bil-khalqi al-awali bal hum fī labsin min khalqin jadīdin
